current.contact_s1_content_1: But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful.
current.contact_s1_content_2: Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain pain of itself, because it is pain, but occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure. To take a trivial example, which of us ever undertakes laborious physical exercise, except to obtain some advantage from it? But who has any right to find fault with a man who chooses to enjoy a pleasure that has no annoying consequences, or one who avoids a pain that produces no resultant pleasure?
current.contact_s1_content_3: The key to more success is to have a lot of pillows. In life you have to take the trash out, if you have trash in your life, take it out, throw it away, get rid of it, major key. How’s business? Boomin. Hammock talk come soon. I’m up to something. Mogul talk. Find peace, life is like a water fall, you’ve gotta flow. You see that bamboo behind me though, you see that bamboo? Ain’t nothin’ like bamboo. Bless up. It’s important to use cocoa butter.

current.shipping_tab_content:
Returns Policy

You may return most new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error (you received an incorrect or defective item, etc.).

You should expect to receive your refund within four weeks of giving your package to the return shipper, however, in many cases you will receive a refund more quickly. This time period includes the transit time for us to receive your return from the shipper (5 to 10 business days), the time it takes us to process your return once we receive it (3 to 5 business days), and the time it takes your bank to process our refund request (5 to 10 business days).

If you need to return an item, simply login to your account, view the order using the 'Complete Orders' link under the My Account menu and click the Return Item(s) button. We'll notify you via e-mail of your refund once we've received and processed the returned item.

Shipping

We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations.

When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page.

Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full po

current.custom_center_content:
There's never been a better time for men to like clothes. But along with the rich variety of labels, styles, and stores speaking to guys of all shapes and sizes comes increased competition. In that crowded landscape, even the most storied brands have to find.
        channelling history while looking towards the future.
current.custom_html_center:
Our story


There's never been a better time for men to like clothes. But along with the rich variety of labels, styles, and stores speaking to guys of all shapes and sizes comes increased competition. In that crowded landscape, even the most storied brands have to find. channelling history while looking towards the future.


by Komol Kuchkarov

settings.faq_title: Does the sonos one pair up with a sonos play1 as a stereo pair ?
settings.faq_content: As long as the players are grouped in a configuration to your liking, you can ask Alexa on the Sonos One or on an echo device to start music and playback will begin across the Sonos grouping.

settings.title_page2:
Make your house
into a home
settings.content_about_1:
One of our mission is to make sure that everyone could be able to afford our products, in general. So with this in mind, we’ve worked hard to reduce the cost and bring our the best offer for our 
beloved customers.
settings.content_about_2: We’ve got everything to help you create a living room that’s ready for entertaining.
settings.title_about2_11: Whether you need a living room, bedroom or dining room set you will find it here in our feet beautifully decorated showroom.

settings.title_about2_33: Whether you need a living room, bedroom or dining room set you will find it here in our feet beautifully decorated showroom.
settings.content_choose1: One of our mission is to make sure that everyone could be able to afford our products, in general.
settings.content_choose2: Quality doesn’t have to be expensive. You heard that right. We aim to make better product with less price tag.

settings.title: Meet Our Team

settings.content: Who's Aldo bietet personalisierte Poster von ihrem Liebling in einem chicen skandinavisch inspirierten Stil. Mit Who's Aldo bekommen Sie eine wunderschöne, individuelle und liebevolle Erinnerung an ihr Haustier und gleichzeitig ein tolles Lifestyle-Piece für ihr Zuhause.

Wählen Sie aus unseren Illustrationen die passende für Tier aus. Geben Sie uns einige Informationen für ihr persönliches Poster, z.B. Name, Geburtsdatum und natürlich Eigenschaften Ihres Lieblings, die Sie verewigen möchten. Nachdem Sie ihren Auftrag eingegeben haben passen unsere Designer ihr Poster an, anschließend wird es in Leipzig gedruckt und direkt an Sie versandt.

settings.title_content: Ich finde keine Illustration meines Vierbeiners. Wann ist es soweit?
settings.content: Wir kreieren kontinuierliche neue Illustrationen. Sollte die für Sie passende Rasse noch nicht dabei sein, lassen Sie es uns bitte hier wissen. Wir informieren Sie dann sofort, sobald die passende Illustration online ist.

settings.title_content: Aus welchen Postergrößen kann ich wählen?
settings.content:
Sie können aus zwei verschiedenen Größen wählne, nämlich:

- A4 - 21 x 29.7 cm
-  A3 - 29,7 x 42 cm

settings.title_content: In welcher Sprache wird das Poster gedruckt?
settings.content: Der Text und damit auch die Sprache ist frei wählbar. Bitte kontrollieren Sie vor dem Absenden des Auftrags den Text. Rechtschreibfehler oder Übersetzungsfehler werden von uns nicht korrigiert, wir drucken den eingegebenen Text.
Nein, Sie bestellen nur das Poster. Ein Rahmen muss separat geordert werden.

settings.title_content: Auf welchem Papier wird das Poster gedruckt?
settings.content: Unsere Poster werden auf wunderschönem 200 gramm/m2 Premium Matte Papier gedruckt.
Da jedes Poster individuell angefertigt wird, ist eine Retoure ausgeschlossen.

settings.title_content: In meiner Bestellung ist ein Fehler, kann ich ihn korrigieren?
settings.content: Sollte Ihnen ein Textfehler in ihrer Bestellung auffallen, melden Sie sich bitte innerhalb von 6 Stunden nach der Bestellung bei support@whosaldo.de. Danach sind keine Änderungen mehr möglich, da wir unsere Poster danach in den Druck geben.
Im Schnitt wird ihr Poster innerhalb Deutschlands binnen 5-7 Werktagen geliefert.

settings.title_content: Ist ein Versand ins Ausland möglich? Wie hoch sind die Versandkosten?
settings.content: Derzeit versenden wir nur nach Deutschland, Österreich und in die Schweiz. Die Versandkosten werden gesondert mit jeder Bestellung ausgewiesen.
Wir akzeptieren Kreditkarte, PayPal, Klarna und GooglePay.
Unsere Poster werden von unserem Team von tierliebenden, fantastischen Designern illustriert. Die Poster werden direkt in Leipzig gedruckt.
Bei Fragen, Anregungen oder Beschwerden, wenden Sie sich gerne an support@whosaldo.de
Das perfekte Geschenk für meine Liebste zum Geburtstag. Es ist ein einzigartiges Geschenk. Sie war total begeistert.
settings.author: Henry

settings.content: Tolles Design, das sich wahnsinnig gut an der Wand macht. Die Qualität des Drucks ist 1A.
settings.author: Alessia

settings.content: Wir lieben das Poster von unserem Max. Danke!
settings.author: Alexander
